title: Is Taylor Swift as big internationally as she is in the US? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not as big as she is in US, but still pretty big. Taking a cumulative of her success worldwide, she is the most famous pop star of the current times. She has the tightest hold in countries like US, Canada, Australia, Japan and to a certain extent UK. In developing markets like India, Brazil, Vietnam, China, she comes somewhere in the top 5.
I don't know about other countries but her Blank Space was played on the loudspeakers during the Ganpati festival here in Pune, India, this year
